sections.heading: to 40-10-24 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 2001, ch. 114, § 405 repealed 40-10-1 to 40-10-24 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1981, ch. 119, §§ 1 to 23 and 25, regarding child custody jurisdiction, effective July 1, 2001. For provisions of former sections,seethe 2000 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present comparable provisions,seeChapter 40, Article 10A NMSA 1978.
